name: Empathy

questions.1: I sometimes find it difficult to see things from the "other guy's" perspective.
questions.2: I sometimes try to understand my friends better by imagining how things look from their perspective.
questions.3: When I'm upset at someone, I usually try to "put myself in his shoes" for a while.
questions.4: Before criticizing somebody, I try to imagine how I would feel if I were in their place.
questions.5: I often have tender, concerned feelings for people less fortunate than me
questions.6: Sometimes I don't feel very sorry for other people when they are having problems.
questions.7: When I see someone being taken advantage of, I feel kind of protective towards them.
questions.8: Other people's misfortunes do not usually disturb me a great deal.
questions.9: When I see someone being treated unfairly, I sometimes don't feel very much pity for them.
questions.10: I am often quite touched by things I see happen.
